subject: BME
title: Directed Biomedical Research Project
description: A biomedical research project carried out under the supervision of a faculty member. Students interested in graduate studies or industrial research careers will gain experience in advanced research techniques and develop valuable research skills. A written report is to be submitted to the course co-ordinator. This course is extra over and above the normal course load. [Note: This course is graded as CR/NCR. Offered: F,W]
